subject: Re: Maybe good news,
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Confusing! I was hearing all this stuff about it being the doomsday comet, so I actaully(yeah I know, not believable) went out and looked at it, and saw it as nothing a few weeks ago. Then all these proclamations of what a nothin' it really is. I think the claims of it being distroyed are bogus--it's just the fake prophets trying to cover their asses. "My guys" have, and still maintain Christmas-2012. If that proves to be nothin' as well, gonna pile the boxes up and lite them on fire! The lesson, don't listen to internet fucktards.

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> David the Spirit Tech, (if I am hearing him correctly) says, that "comet,  
> Elenin was destroyed yesterday 8-31-11 he said it completely  
> disintegrated."  Our good old Sun took it out so, if this is true, it's a  true blessing 
> for this planet, and we should all thank God.  Planet X, aka  Nebaru sp is 
> still on it's way, don't know what's going to happen with it yet.  sf
>
